availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Smith Abbott in Clark County, Indiana, on May 30, 1827. Father of W.R. Abbott and Lewis Abbott. Appointed postmaster in Clark County Indiana on December 6, 1839. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 20.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, p. 154-55, (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Indiana Marriage Records (1810-2001), Clark County Marriages, Film #001415852, p. 196-97.
